data.title: Institution Building
data.meta_description: Institution Building displays and questions the diverse elements of a museum—from the most visible parts (the exhibition) to the often unseen or hidden components (archive, administration, maintenance).
data.text:
Institution Building displays and questions the diverse elements of a museum—from the most visible parts (the exhibition) to the often unseen or hidden components (archive, administration, maintenance). The exhibition has been growing week by week, with an institutional element added sequentially, presenting the institution as a cadavre exquis—an ever changing organism, constantly questioning and legitimizing its raison d’être.

Hospitality / August 26: architecten jan de vylder inge vinck, Daniel Birnbaum, DJI Mini 2 Drone, Jean Glibert, Zak Kyes / Radim Pesko, Jacques Ligot (with Eimi Leggett, Timothy Nouzak, Mary Szydlowska, Mooni Van Tichel)

Pedagogy / September 30: Valerio Borgonuovo / Silvia Franceschini / Remo Buti, Renaat Braem, CLARA / Wim Cuyvers, Beatriz Colomina, Luc Deleu – T.O.P office, Antoine Devaux, Cornelia Escher / Lars Fischer / Oswald Mathias Ungers, Jacques Gillet / René Greisch / Félix Roulin / Jacques Antoine, LABEL (Jean-Didier Bergilez, Michel Lefèvre, Thibaut Rome) / MUOTO (Gilles Delalex, Yves Moreau), Frei Otto / IL, Raphael Pirenne / WIP (Justine Babut, Adèle Boterf, Victoria Cattani, Justine Debaene, Jade Rouanet), NEWROPE (Panayotis Antoniadis, Seppe De Blust, Lukas Fink, Falma Fshazi, Evelyne Gordon, Michiel van lersel, Freek Persyn, Charlotte Schaeben, Ina Valkanova), Vera Sacchetti, Social Design Collaborative (Swati Janu), Paul-Émile Vincent, Mark Wigley

Emancipation / October 7: Aristide Antonas, Alexander Auris, BC architects, Felix Beytout / Jacques Hondelatte /Juan Perez Amaya, Bicoli Collective (Emma Herman, Cléo Hesse, Alix Meuwly), Blurbs – Generative Writing Club (Dana Kuehr, Ailsa Cavens, Tania Garduño Israde), Anne Dessing, Leong Leong / Killefer Flammang Architects, Mothers & Daughters (Alice Versieux, Ben Pigeard-Benazera, Byrthe Lemmens, Claire Gilder, Jessica Gysel, Joëlle Sambi Nzeba, Katja Mater, Marnie Slater, Mia Melvær, Misha Verdonck, Nyira Hens, Robin Brettar), Pedro Pitarch, Selma Robert / Akarova / Denis Martin / Michèle Noiret / Madie Marcuna / Anne Van Zeeland / Flora Romana, Raphaël Julien Saint Amand, Apolline Vrancken / Simone Guillissen-Hoa / Marcel Anneet / Jacques Dupuis / Eliane Havenith / Nicolas Schimp-Urban.brussels, Studio Ossidiana,Whanganui River, Woman Cave Collective (Chloé Macary-Carney, Léticia Chanliau, Aleksandra Belova)

Environment / October 14: Accattone magazine (Ismaël Bennani, Sophie Dars, Orfée Grandhomme, Carlo Menon, Galaad Van Daele) / Alice Nouvet / Alice Paris / Camille Pons / Plant & Houtgoed (Jeroen Deseyn, Nicolas Vandenplas), Daniel Barber, Paul Duvigneaud, Jean-Jules Eggericx, Peter Fischli / David Weiss, Sharona Franklin, Stephan Kampelmann, KARBON’ Jean Garcin / Claire Valette, Openstructures (Thomas Lommée), Jean Painlevé, Coline Rosoux, Maria Fernanda Serna, Bas Smets, SUPERFLEX, Wael Al Awar / Kenichi Teramoto

Preservation / October 21: AgwA, Lucia Allais, Bovenbouw Architectuur & DDS+ / Caruso St John Architects/ MA2 Metzger et Associes Architecture / René Stapels, b+ (Arno Brandlhuber, Olaf Grawert, Angelika Hinterbrandner, Roberta Jurčić and Gregor Zorzi), Pieterjan Ginckels + STUDIO SNOWFLAKE (Eva Demulder, Sarah Tilley, Ferre Vander Elst), Sandi Hilal / Alessandro Petti, Victor Horta, Stanislas Jasinski, Clara Leverd / Véronique Patteeuw / Madelon Vriesendorp, Charlotte Malterre-Barthes, Jorge Otero-Pailos, PEAKS (Charles Aubertin, Camille Dupont, Samuel Jaubert de Beaujeu, Éva Maloisel), Permanent Brussels (WIP), Marie-Françoise Plissart, Sumayya Vally, XDGA I Xaveer De Geyter Architects / Barbara Van der Wee

Idiom / October 28: Apparatus 22 (Maria Farcas, Dragos Olea, Erika Olea, Ioana Nemes), architecten jan de vylder inge vinck / Patrick Demuylder / Renaud De Staercke / Christophe Méaux, dank.lloyd.wright, Luca Frei, Carsten Höller/ Barbara Vanderlinden / Jens Hoffmann, Andrés Jaque, John Knight, Zak Keyes (Zak Group), Léopold Lambert, New South (Meriem Chabani, Etienne Chobaux, John Edom), OASE Journal (Justin Agyin, Tom Avermaete, Aslı Çiçek, Bart Decroos, Stefan Devoldere, Kornelia Dimitrova, Jantje Engels, Christoph Grafe, Maarten Liefooghe, Sereh Mandias, Véronique Patteeuw, David Peleman, Elsbeth Ronner, Hans Teerds, Christophe Van Gerrewey), PLMD PleaseLetMeDesign, Barbara Stauffacher Solomon, Territorial Agency (John Palmesino & Ann-Sofi Rönnskog), Wim Waelput

The first project by the newly appointed artistic director Nikolaus Hirsch, the exhibition marks the beginning of a transition phase during which CIVA will move to a new location at Kanal, with an inauguration in 2024. Institution Building is an institutional self-reflection, a questioning of the role of cultural institutions as such—and of the CIVA in particular.

The podcast series include: David Adjaye, listen / Rem Koolhaas & Ingo Niermann, listen / Hilary Sample, listen / Daniel Barber, listen / Wael Al Awar, listen / Barbara Stauffacher Solomon, listen / Simon Denny, listen / Vikramaditya Prakash, listen / John Palmesino, listen / Aric Chen, listen / Juan Perez-Amaya and FÃ©lix Beytout, listen / Parasite 2.0, listen / Vera Sacchetti, listen / Sharona Franklin, listen / Keller Easterling, listen / Samia Henni, listen

Curated by Nikolaus Hirsch, Matylda Krzykowski, Cédric Libert
